Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: In this paper we aim to draw to the fact that caution is needed when prescribing vitamin A - containing drugs to women of childbearing years .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Vitamin A deficiency |
| Childbearing years |

Note: "Childbearing years" is not a disease, but rather a term used to describe the period of a woman's life when she is able to become pregnant and give birth. It is included in the table as it is mentioned in the paragraph as a factor to consider when prescribing vitamin A-containing drugs.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
